Importing a Getting Started Guide into Spring Tool Suite
relationships.tail: This tutorial demonstrates installing Spring Tool Suite (STS), importing a Spring Getting Started guide (e.g., Consuming Rest), selecting Maven/Gradle build systems, managing initial/complete code sets, and opening the guide within STS for seamless integration between tutorial and code.
